trans-unit.source: An abstract WCF extension class for specifying a custom discovery service or for getting the published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Uma WCF extensão classe abstrata para especificar um serviço de descoberta personalizado ou para obter os pontos de extremidade publicados.

trans-unit.source: Derive a class from DiscoveryServiceExtension and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> method to return your custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: Derive uma classe de DiscoveryServiceExtension e substituir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>método para retornar o serviço de detecção personalizada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your derived class to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> extensions that host your discoverable service.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar a classe derivada de <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>extensões que hospedam o serviço detectável.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A> is called the behavior iterates through the extensions in the service host and looks for a DiscoveryServiceExtension.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>é chamado o comportamento itera por meio de extensões no host do serviço e procura um DiscoveryServiceExtension.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If one is found its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> is called to get the custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: Se ele encontrar seu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>é chamado para obter o serviço de detecção personalizada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an extension is not found the default discovery service implementation is used.
trans-unit.target: Se uma extensão não foi encontrada para a implementação do serviço de descoberta padrão será usada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return your custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método para retornar personalizados <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"> </xref> implementação.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown while opening the service host if this method returns `null`
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é gerada ao abrir o host de serviço se esse método retornar `null` </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>
Uma implementação de serviço personalizado de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção somente leitura de pontos de extremidade publicadas.

trans-unit.source: The property should be accessed only after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> has successfully opened.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade deve ser acessado apenas depois de <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>foi aberto com êxito.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> is in <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> is being generated and added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>está em <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata>está sendo gerado e adicionado à coleção.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura de pontos de extremidade publicadas.
